name: IKEA
description: Project for IKEA to redesign their online store with React.
details: Detailed case study for the IKEA project, including the use of React, Redux, and TailwindCSS to build a responsive, scalable web application for their online store.

name: Toll Brothers
description: Redesigned the Toll Brothers website to enhance the user experience.
details: This project involved a complete overhaul of the Toll Brothers website, focusing on user experience and improving site navigation. Built using Next.js and styled with TailwindCSS.

name: MarketShare Movers
description: Developed a custom data visualization platform for MarketShare Movers.
details: MarketShare Movers wanted a custom data visualization platform for their B2B clients. This project used D3.js for data visualization and React for the front-end.
